channel.title: CVE Feed for Dahua -- IPC-HX8XXX and NVR4XXX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dahua -- IPC-HX8XXX and NVR4XXX

item.title: CVE-2024-39944|2024-07-31T19:10:56.884Z -- dahua -- ipc-hx8xxx%20and%20nvr4xxx
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in Dahua products.Attackers can send carefully crafted data packets to the interface with vulnerabilities, causing the device to crash.
